attributes.action: Bring Boris Johson back into his prime ministers role
attributes.background: We want the whole of the UK to unite behind boris, to bring the UK back on its feet with resolutions to current downfall of our current government. Bring back the Great into Britain.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
